colombia_special_api_identity_lookup.title: Colombie - Private Citizen Information
colombia_special_api_identity_lookup.description: Access private citizen information for Colombian nationals. This service provides comprehensive personal data including detailed identity verification. Contact Verifik customer service for more details.

colombia_api_identity_lookup.title: Colombie - National ID Verification
colombia_api_identity_lookup.description: Verify Colombian national ID (cédula) information. Get full name, document status, and basic citizen verification data.

colombia_special_api_police_identity_loo.title: Colombie - Police Records Check
colombia_special_api_police_identity_loo.description: Check police records through Colombia's National Police system. Verify interactions with law enforcement and police records. Requires document type, document number, and expedition date.

world_api_dea.title: Mondial - DEA Background Check
world_api_dea.description: Comprehensive background check service using DEA (Drug Enforcement Administration) databases. Search by full name OR document number with document type. Verify individuals against international drug enforcement records.

colombia_api_military_situation.title: Colombie - Military Service Records
colombia_api_military_situation.description: Verify military service records through Colombia's military system. Check service status, military obligations, and service records. Requires Colombian ID (CC) and document number.

colombia_api_rethus.title: Colombie - Health Records Verification
colombia_api_rethus.description: Access Colombian health records through Rethus system. Verify medical history, health status, and healthcare provider information. Requires document type (CC, CE, PPT) and document number.

colombia_api_rues.title: Colombie - Company Registration Verification
colombia_api_rues.description: Verify company registration through Colombia's RUES (Registro Único Empresarial y Social) system. Check business registration, legal status, and company information. Requires document type and document number.

colombia_api_dian.title: Colombie - Tax Information Verification
colombia_api_dian.description: Verify tax information through Colombia's DIAN (Dirección de Impuestos y Aduanas Nacionales) system. Check tax status, obligations, and compliance records. Requires document type and document number.

peru_api_company_lookup.title: Pérou - Business Registration Lookup
peru_api_company_lookup.description: Business verification service for Peru. Provides company registration details, legal status, and business information.
